pages.title: Foxhound
pages.infos: Foxhounds are similar to the $(l:creatures/wolf)wolf$(/l) in appearance and behavior. Like most mobs native to the Nether, they are immune to $(effect)fire damage$(0).

pages.text: Foxhounds growl and will attack $(l:creatures/skeleton)skeletons$(/l). An attack from a Foxhound damages the player and sets them on $(thing)fire$(0).

pages.title: Foxhound
pages.infos: Tamed foxhounds will snooze on top of hot blocks such as $(block)magma blocks$(0). When a Foxhound sleeps on an $(block)active furnace$(0) it will speed up the $(thing)furnace's operation speed$(0).
